Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell with 1 wt%Sr/La2O3-BiO-Ag-YSZ membrane was applied to oxidative coupling of methane.
Titulo: An experimental study of oxidative coupling of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell with 1 wt% Sr/La2O3-Bi2O3-Ag-YSZ membrane

Sentencas: Membrane composition had a great effect on the reaction and current generated.
Titulo: An experimental study of oxidative coupling of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell with 1 wt% Sr/La2O3-Bi2O3-Ag-YSZ membrane

Sentencas: An increase in the current generated was accompanied by a decrease in C-2 selectivity and an increase in CH4 conversion.
Titulo: An experimental study of oxidative coupling of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell with 1 wt% Sr/La2O3-Bi2O3-Ag-YSZ membrane

Sentencas: There is an optimal temperature for C-2-selectivity.
Titulo: An experimental study of oxidative coupling of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell with 1 wt% Sr/La2O3-Bi2O3-Ag-YSZ membrane

Sentencas: CH4 conversion decreased, C-2-selectivity increased and current generated decreased slightly with a rise in total now rates.
Titulo: An experimental study of oxidative coupling of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell with 1 wt% Sr/La2O3-Bi2O3-Ag-YSZ membrane

Sentencas: CH4 conversion and the current generated increased with a rise in oxygen concentration.
Titulo: An experimental study of oxidative coupling of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell with 1 wt% Sr/La2O3-Bi2O3-Ag-YSZ membrane

Sentencas: if only C-2-selectivity and current were concerned, the higher the methane concentration, the more favourable for the cogeneration of electrical energy and ethane and ethylene.
Titulo: An experimental study of oxidative coupling of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell with 1 wt% Sr/La2O3-Bi2O3-Ag-YSZ membrane

Sentencas: Stability of the membrane was also tested.
Titulo: An experimental study of oxidative coupling of methane in a solid oxide fuel cell with 1 wt% Sr/La2O3-Bi2O3-Ag-YSZ membrane
